lines.text: Don't you think you better get out of here before I get mad?
You know, I can get mad once in a while too.
You want to hit me with your hat?
I don't feel like it right now.

[last words, to Slip]
This is the last picture I do with you!
Calling all cars, stolen police car.

[unknowingly driving the police car]
Police shouldn't steal cars, well, just goes to show you can't trust anybody.
I'm just watching my suit rubbing elbows with the wrong people.
Why do women gotta be so imperceptible?
